name: Green Tea
description: Pour hot water over green tea leaves and steep for 2-3 minutes. The water should be cooled slightly to avoid bitterness. Perfect for a calm, focused moment.

name: Black Tea
description: Steep black tea in freshly boiled water for 4-5 minutes. Add milk and sugar to taste. A classic ritual for morning energy.

name: Chamomile Tea
description: Steep chamomile flowers in hot water for 5 minutes. Add honey for sweetness. Perfect for evening relaxation and better sleep.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Whisk matcha powder with hot water until frothy. Add steamed milk and sweetener if desired. A creamy, energizing ritual.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Mix cocoa powder and sugar with a small amount of hot milk. Add remaining milk and stir. Top with whipped cream or marshmallows. Pure comfort in a cup.

name: Ginger Lemon Tea
description: Steep fresh ginger slices in boiling water for 10 minutes. Add lemon juice and honey. A warming, immune-boosting ritual.

name: Peppermint Tea
ingredients: Fresh or dried peppermint leaves (1 tbsp)
description: Pour hot water over peppermint leaves and steep for 5 minutes. Strain and add honey if desired. Refreshing and soothing for digestion.
